DOC.criteria: First IVF/ICSI cycle ; With normal ovarian reserve ( FSH < 10 mIU/mL ; antral follicle count > 5 ) ; Age 38 year old ; With normal uterine ; Tubal factor infertility Preimplantation genetic diagnosis cycle ; Oocyte donation sperm donation cycle .
